thread.title: Stonebwoy wins Best Dancehall Artist at 2015 AFRIMMA
thread.title_full: Stonebwoy wins Best Dancehall Artist at 2015 AFRIMMA

title: Stonebwoy wins Best Dancehall Artist at 2015 AFRIMMA
text:
Source: Ghana | Myjoyonline.com | Ernest Dela Aglanu (Twitter: @delaXdela / Instagram: citizendela) Date: 12-10-2015 Time: 11:10:42:am Stonebwoy 
Dancehall artiste, Stonebwoy has been adjudged Best Dancehall Artist at 2015 edition of African Muzik Magazine Awards (AFRIMMA). 
This year’s edition of the awards, which celebrated musical talent across the African continent, was held Saturday night at the Academy of Black Letters in Dallas, Texas in the US. 
Stonebwoy, who received three nominations at this year’s awards, beat fellow artiste Shatta Wale, and other African artistes, Timaya (Nigeria), MC Norman (Uganda), Wax Dey (Cameroon), Dr. Jose Chameleon (Uganda), Patoranking (Nigeria) and Buffalo Soldier (Zimbabwe)to win the Best Dancehall Artist award. 
The event, hosted by African Comedy King Basketmouth and East Africa comedy Queen Anne Kansiime, recognised and awarded several other musicians from Africa and around the globe for their contribution to African music. 
Among the night’s biggest winners included Tanzanian artiste Diamond Platnumz who won Best Male East Africa, Afrimma Video of The Year and the biggest award of the night, African Artist of the Year. 
The ceremony apart from awards, witnessed exciting performances from some of the continent’s biggest acts including Davido, Kcee and Yemi Alade. 
Below is the full list of winners: 
Best Male West Africa – Davido 
Best Female West Africa Yemi Alade 
Best Newcomer – Kiss Daniel – Ommy Dimpoz 
Best Male East Africa – Diamond Platnumz 
Best Video Director – Godfather 
Best Male Central Africa – Yuri da Cunha 
Best Female East Africa – Vanessa Mdee 
Best African DJ USA – Dj Simple Simon 
AFRIMMA Video of The Year –‘Nana’ by Diamond Platnumz ft Flavour 
Best Male Southern Africa – Aka 
Crossing Boundaries With Music Award – Jidenna 
Song of The Year – Ojuelegba – Wizkid 
Best Dancehall Artist – Patoranking Stonebwoy 
Best Dance In A Video – Serge Beynaud – Okeninkpin 
Best Collaboration – Aka ft Burnaboy, DaL.E.S and JR – All Eyes On Me 
Artist of The Year – Diamond Platnumz 
AFRIMMA Inspirational Song – Bracket ft Diamond Platnumz – Alive * 
Transformational Leadership Award – Botswana President, Lieutenant General Seretse Khama Ian Khama 
Legendary Award – Youssou Ndour 
Music Producer of The Year – Legendury Beatz 
Best Female Central Africa – Mani Bella 
Best dancehall Artist – Stonebwoy 
Best Dance In A Video – Serge Beynaud Okeninkpin. 
AFRIMMA Humanitarian Artist – 2face Idibia 
Best Dance Group – Sauti Sol 
Best Dance Group – D3 dancers 
Best African DJ – Jimmy Jatt 
Best Gospel Artist – Icha Chavons
